com.gazbert.patterns.creational.builder

Class AbstractCustomerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gazbert.patterns.creational.builder.AbstractCustomerBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BorrowingCustomerBuilder, InvestingCustomerBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractCustomerBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The Abstract Builder provides all of the different buildXXX methods the Concrete Builders could choose to build for creating a Customer.

    Also provides a get Customer operations that Concrete Builders must honour.

    Author:
    gazbert
